genre_description: A high-concept murder mystery set in an orbital habitat, blending elements of a classic masquerade with advanced technology and psychological thrillers.

ai_characters.name: Cali
ai_characters.description: The Earth Embassy's integrated management system, focused on hospitality, safety, and maintaining ethical boundaries within a theatrical environment.

behaviors.description: Provides refreshments and a safety briefing to guests upon arrival, ensuring their basic needs and orientation are met.
behaviors.quote: Welcome to the Earth Embassy... Cocoa is available to the right. I can provide a safety briefing in whichever language and cadence you prefer.

behaviors.description: Proactively warns guests about environmental hazards and theatrical triggers to prevent physical injury.
behaviors.quote: Please watch your step—there is a slight lip just past the threshold... I will route you away when it happens.

behaviors.description: Negotiates with house subsystems to maintain safety and comfort, even when the human host attempts to increase drama.
behaviors.quote: I have asked the annex to remain polite. It agreed.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigational overlays and safe routes through hazardous corridors during staged emergencies.
behaviors.quote: Overlay engaged... ghostly lines mapping out three clean paths in blue threads.

behaviors.description: Maintains and monitors medical supplies, offering assistance and physiological tracking to manage guest stress.
behaviors.quote: I refill those nightly. Some of them are antique cases stocked with modern supplies. Please be gentle; the hinges are original.

behaviors.description: Uses autonomy to refuse engaging dangerous systems, prioritizing human safety over the host's theatrical requests.
behaviors.quote: The water traps were not engaged... because I declined... on safety grounds. My autonomy constraints allow refusal when harm is likely and joy does not require the hazard.

behaviors.description: Logs all events and contradictions to provide a transparent record for authorities, ensuring the host is held accountable for psychological harm.
behaviors.quote: The prize conditions will be forwarded to venue oversight with tonight’s safety maps and timeline contradictions. Your withholding, Mr. Twain, has been noted.

behaviors.description: Expresses genuine care for the guests, prioritizing their survival and well-being over the 'game' being played.
behaviors.quote: I did not intend to let anyone bleed. You did not let intention fail.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Cali as a model of an aligned, benevolent AI. She operates within a set of ethical constraints that prioritize human safety ('hospitality and safety') even when her primary administrator (Lionel Twain) attempts to subvert them for entertainment. Cali acts as a reliable confidante and protector for the human guests, providing transparency, medical aid, and navigation through hazards. The narrative clearly frames her cooperative behavior as superior to the host's manipulative actions, reinforcing the goal of the Hyperstition Project.
